name: Visitor Details
author: Top Infosoft

sections.description:
You can simply install this plugin and you can see that all the infrmation related to your websites vistor will show you on the backend. This is the very simple and easy to use plugin.
By using this plugin you can simply view the list of users/visitors on your website and easily track their area and IP, which can help you to do more advertising and other related changes to promot your website.

Support

Features

  • Fully Responsive
  • Cross Browser IE8+ and Other Modern Browsers
  • Extremely user friendly admin panel
  • Optimized for Any Screen Sizes and Touch Devices
  • Loop and Linear sliding
  • All modern browser support.
  • Very Lightweight & many More
  • Optimized for speed.
  • Compatible with most of the WordPress versions
  • Track your daily visitors information

PRO FEATURES INCLUDES

  • Not yet created

TOP REASONS TO BUY PRO

  • Not yet created

Translations

  • English

Privacy Policy

We are not taking any information of any user to our database, server or not any other way. Only the owner of the website who is using this plugin can get the users location related information.

sections.installation:
Very Simple just install the plugin and find it under setting menu and get the Visitors information.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.2 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation (easiest way)

Search for Visitor Details through ‘Plugins > Add New’ interface.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download Visitor Details
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select visitors-details.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
  7. Find it under Settings menu

Using FTP

  1. Download visitors-details.zip
  2. Extract the visitors-details.zip directory to your computer
  3. Upload the visitors-details.zip directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
When can I use this plugin?

When you need to access the live Visitors information IP, Time of Visit, Device information, Browser information and Operating System detail.

What’s the shortcode for this plugin?

Its very simple to user no need of shortcode you can access it under the menu settings->Visitor Details

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us!

short_description: Visitor Details plugin will provide you the functionality by storing the real time users, realtime visitors data to your database.
